ValidationRule.description: The CA Name selected should be coherent with the store selected on the request except if the case is closed, or running user has an admin profil or Datastage profil.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $User.BypassVR__c), NOT($Profile.Name = 'System Administrator'), NOT($Profile.Name = 'LV_Interface_Datastage'), NOT( ISBLANK(CA_store__c)) , Store__r.RetailStoreId__c != CA_store__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The CA is not associated to the store selected
